name: The Sov Company MCP (OECD ICIO Dependencies)
description: Public MCP endpoint exposing read-only dependency analytics backed by OECD ICIO-style input-output tables. Designed for LLM tooling and programmatic use via Streamable HTTP (SSE).

limits.notes: Requests may be rate-limited to protect service availability.

tools.name: product_dependency_top_suppliers
tools.summary: Top supplier countries for a buyer country + sector + year.

tools.name: product_dependency_top_sectors
tools.summary: Top buyer sectors importing from a supplier for a given buyer country.

tools.name: product_dependency_compare_countries
tools.summary: Compare dependency across multiple buyer countries for same sector + supplier.

tools.name: product_dependency_time_series
tools.summary: Time series of dependency for buyer country + sector + supplier.

dataset.source: OECD ICIO-derived tables loaded in Postgres

granularity.countries: ISO3 + aggregates (e.g. OUT/ROW depending on dataset)
granularity.sectors: OECD ICIO activity codes (e.g. C26, C20, ...)

coverage_notes: Aggregates like OUT/ROW may appear depending on the view.
limitations: These are macro input-output estimates; not firm-level ground truth.
Interpret dependency_pct as share of buyer sector inputs attributable to supplier country for the chosen view.
